job.title: Software Engineer In Test - IL08273343
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: This job was posted by https://illinoisjoblink.illinois.gov : For more information, please see: https://illinoisjoblink.illinois.gov/ada/r/jobs/8273343 Software Engineer In Test, Glassdoor Inc., Chicago, IL. Utilize automated test tools and frameworks to test Glassdoor code for defects; build maintainable tests; execute code with a high level of quality, maintainability, and testability; initiate ways to improve code base, technical debt, and/or processes to improve team productivity; Debug and troubleshoot in QA and production environments; and provide guidance on testing methodologies. Employer requires a Master's degree in Business Analytics, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field, or foreign equivalent, and two (2) years of experience with the following: Java and Java-based tools like Selenium, JUnit, or TestNG; CI/CD tools like Jenkins; Javascript, HTML, and CSS; and SQL.*Employer will accept any combination of education, experience, or training. To apply, send resume to: E. Sung at Glassdoor, Inc., 100 Shoreline Hwy Suite 100, Mill Valley, CA 94941. Must reference Job # 20639.93
